title: Tamale
description: A single tamale wrapped in a corn husk.
apple_vendor_description: The tamale emoji, as rendered on Apple devices, presents a perfectly formed, steamed masa husk, subtly unfurled to reveal a hint of its savory filling within. Its texture is rendered with soft, natural shading, suggesting the warmth and comforting aroma of this traditional dish, a hallmark of Apple's attention to detail. On Apple devices, this emoji evokes feelings of culinary delight, cultural appreciation, and the joy of sharing a delicious meal.
